pre_caption_prompt: As a professional captioner and cinematographer, describe how the subjects move throughout the video, beginning from the first frame. Write a single, concise, and fluent paragraph that emphasizes subject motion, visual detail, and natural progression over time. Your description should be visually grounded and coherent, as if narrating exactly what a viewer would observe. Do not mention the camera, editing techniques, or visual effects.
pre_caption: Initially, a young man in a light green shirt and blue jeans strides from right to left across a black and white checkerboard crosswalk. In the background, a yellow taxi drives away from the viewer, and a cyclist pedals in the same direction as the man, further down the street. On the far sidewalk, another pedestrian in a yellow jacket walks from left to right, passing a vibrant flower stall. The crosswalk's surface then changes to an intricate white line pattern on a dark grey background. The young man continues his leftward journey over this new design. As he moves, a woman in a bright yellow outfit enters from the left, walking right towards the crosswalk. Concurrently, an animated woman with pink hair, a green outfit, and yellow pants, holding a small pink creature, also walks from left to right across the patterned ground, followed by a man in a suit, while the individual in the yellow jacket continues their rightward progress near the bustling flower stall.
